briefTitle: Study on Efficacy and Safety of Reparixin in the Treatment of Hospitalized Patients With Severe COVID-19 Pneumonia.
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Reparixin in the Treatment of Hospitalized Patients With Severe COVID-19 Pneumonia
summary: The study objective is to assess Efficacy and safety of Reparixin treatment as compared to placebo (both on top of standard treatment) in adult patients with severe COVID-19 pneumonia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Patients Alive and Free of Respiratory Failure at Day 28
